If I have the menu button (ie the button left of the tabs), when pressing F10, the menu bar shows up, but the menu button doesn't disappears. and as soon as I press on the menu button or I release the mouse from a menu from the menu bar, the menu bar disappears.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Unselect the menu bar (hide it)
2. Press F10
Actual Results:  
Menu bar appears.. and menu button stays

Expected Results:  
Either nothing happens... or the menu button is replaced by the menu bar.
